apps.name: Beatstar
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Add your liked songs to an Apple Music Playlist and claim a free Beatstar song matched from your music collection
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This allows us to access your camera roll so you can upload photos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Sharing your data allows us to optimize the video ads we show.
